This is Modiv

We all want financial freedom and we are all willing to work hard to achieve it. However, working hard is not enough; the path to lasting wealth is ownership. Study the wealthy long enough and a pattern begins to emerge. They have money that works even while they sleep and their money doesn’t just work harder — it works smarter.

Smart money investors understand the value of complex commercial real estate investments. We do too. We’re Modiv and we’re making real estate ownership more accessible to more people and we’re doing it like it's never been done before: by offering investments that are designed for investors.

Who We Are

Modiv is a pioneer in the direct-to-consumer commercial real estate product industry having created one of the largest non-listed real estate investment trusts (“REITs”) to be raised via crowdfunding technology.

We believe that the real estate industry can — and should — do better for investors. For too long, individual investors were unable to access traditional commercial real estate. Those who did, were largely at the mercy of investment vehicles that were designed to benefit the sponsor — not the investor.

The result is Modiv, a reimagined real estate investment company helmed by a team that has the benefit of more than 100 years of experience and the wisdom to let that experience inform what to maintain and what to change.

We are not content with just owning a high-quality real estate portfolio and being one of the best-in-class leadership teams, we want to do more. That’s why we’re changing the industry through consolidation and by bringing our high standards to even more investors.

We’re working tirelessly to realize a mission that serves investors before industry and responsibly increases access to commercial real estate for hard-working people. We’re poised for smart growth and unafraid to innovate. Our resilient portfolio strategy is designed to provide durable income across market cycles and keep pushing toward what’s next, no matter what’s happening now. We are Modiv, a reimagined real estate investment company helmed by a team that has the benefit of more than 100 combined years of real estate experience as well as the talent and tenacity to take on an entire industry and change it for the better.

The Executive Team

Our leadership team of real estate veterans ensures our investors are the heart of each and every action we take because it’s the right thing to do for our investors and our business alike.

Aaron Halfacre

Chief Executive Officer

Aaron Halfacre

Mr. Halfacre is charged with crafting the company-wide strategy and accelerating business growth. With his long track record of institutional grade investing, he has sparked a new vision and direction for Modiv that prioritizes responsible stewardship and purposeful growth.

His previously held positions include President at RealtyMogul, President and CIO of Campus Crest, and senior leadership roles at Cole Real Estate Investments, BlackRock and Green Street Advisors.

Ray Pacini

Chief Financial Officer

Mitchell Germain

Chief Capital Officer

Sandra Sciutto

Chief Accounting Officer

David Collins

Chief Property Officer

William R. Broms

Chief Investment Officer

John Raney

Chief Legal Officer

Industry Leading Corporate Governance

Our board of directors brings the foremost experts in real estate investment and best-in-class corporate governance together to deliver on Modiv’s relentless commitment to putting investors first and maximizing shareholder value over the long-term. Having served on the boards at some of the most well-known, well-respected companies in the real estate industry, including CBRE, Move, Inc. (operator of Realtor.com), Spirit Realty Capital, Inc., and Equity Commonwealth, among many others, our board of directors brings its unparalleled industry knowledge to the challenge of building a REIT for the real world and the investors that live in it.

Ray Wirta
Ray Wirta

Mr. Wirta has a passion for cutting-edge real estate strategies which has infused his career with innovations, and in this role as the chairman of the board, he brings to Modiv an unparalleled talent for uncovering opportunities and delivering shareholder value.

He is also a board member and former chairman and Chief Executive Officer of CBRE Group, Inc, a Fortune 500 and S&P 500 company that is the world’s largest commercial real estate services and investment firm. He has also served as Chief Executive Officer for Koll Management Services and The Bolsa Chica Company.

Adam S. Markman
Curtis B. McWIlliams

Jeffrey Randolph
Joseph Hanauer

Our Story

Everyone has a story. We’re no exception — ours is a tale of challenge and opportunity. Innovation and transformation. Explore our timeline to see the evolution of Modiv and how we got to where we are today.

NNN REIT is Launched

Established with a focus on investing in single-tenant, net lease commercial properties through USA. Between May 14, 2015 and September 20, 2019 acquires $450 million of Assets Under Management

May 14, 2015
NNN REIT Acquires Crowdfunding Pioneer

Rich Uncles was one for the first online crowd funding real estate platforms having launched in 2012. The brand and its assets were acquired by NN REIT in late 2019 and served as the public-facing brand of the combined company.

September 20, 2019
REITless Joins Growing Portfolio

The offering focused on lending and strategic debt investments to primarily single- and multi-family real estate development and redevelopment projects that aimed to produce positive social impact in communities nationwide.

September 22, 2020
BuildingBITs Adds Reg A+ Offering

The pioneering Reg A+ offering that allows accredited and non-accredited investors to acquire fractionalized interests of individual commercial real estate properties each held in distinctive share classes, called "Bits:, was launched in 2018.

October 1, 2020
Modiv Debuts to Reimagine Real Estate
